Password Pro: Single & Bulk

Secure your online presence with Password Pro: Single & Bulk! This powerful and versatile Chrome extension lets you create strong, unique passwords tailored to your specific needs.

Key Features:
Customizable Passwords: Generate passwords with your choice of symbols, capital letters, lowercase letters, and special characters.
Flexible Length: Decide how long you want your passwords to be, from short and simple to long and complex.
Bulk Password Generation: Easily create multiple passwords at once, perfect for setting up new accounts or updating existing ones.
User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive and easy-to-use design ensures quick and hassle-free password generation.
Enhanced Security: Protect your online accounts with robust, hard-to-guess passwords, reducing the risk of unauthorized access.
Whether you need a single password or multiple ones, Password Pro: Single & Bulk has you covered. Keep your accounts safe and secure with custom-generated passwords at your fingertips!
